Title: Ep. 86 - Intro to Databases (Mark Nadal)
Description: Mark Nadal was a front end developer looking for a better database. So he built his own. He walks us through the different types of databases, the limitations you might run into as you use them, and why he decided to build his own graph database. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
